product_name: Crocs Mammoth EVO Clogs - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The fuzzy Crocs Mammoth EVO Clogs for kids combine cool Crocs style with warm and cozy polyester shearling liners. Crocs Mammoth EVO Clogs for kids are composed of a patented, closed-cell resin that softens and molds to feet with body heat-incredibly light and easy to clean. Polyester shearling liners hug feet in snuggly warmth and are removable and washable for easy care. Built-in arch supports, orthotic-style heels, and tarsal bars hold feet comfortably while tiny nubs stimulate circulation and refresh your feet. Nonmarking, slip-resistant outsoles leave no trace; liner should be hand washed and line dried. Closeout.
short_description: The fuzzy Crocs Mammoth EVO Clogs for kids combine cool Crocs style with warm and cozy polyester shearling liners.
